function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of telemedicine platforms for screening COVID-19","Impact":"Potential inability to effectively screen and diagnose COVID-19 cases","Mitigation":"Ensure reliable and accurate screening protocols are in place, and train healthcare professionals in effective telemedicine screening techniques","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, AI-assisted screening tools","People":"Potential COVID-19 patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Minimal human contact treatment using telemedicine strategies","Impact":"Risk of inadequate in-person evaluation and care for patients","Mitigation":"Implement strict protocols for in-person evaluation when necessary and ensure continuous monitoring of patient health remotely","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, remote monitoring devices","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, medical staff"},{"Description":"Integration of telemedicine with other technologies","Impact":"Increased complexity and potential for technology failure","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and integration of technologies, regular maintenance and updates, and training for healthcare professionals on multiple technology platforms","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, drones, robots, smart wearables, 5G networks","People":"Healthcare professionals, technology specialists","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, technology providers"}]}
